boardgame.description: This game entry refers to two nearly identical games that are not compatible with one another. Ages 6 and up._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;PitchCar and Carabande are dexterity games where large, wooden, puzzle-like pieces are used to construct a race track that looks very similar to a slot car track when finished. But instead of using electrons, players use finger-flicks to send small pucks around the track, a la Carrom._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Contents:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Eight car discs_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; One black _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;spacer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; disc_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Six straightaways _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Ten 90-degree curves _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Rail pieces for straights and curves_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; One Start/Finish line sticker_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; One rule sheet with suggested track layouts_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; One score pad_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Carabande was produced by Goldsieber and had only the single expansion with the Action Set. Both are currently out of print. It was also produced in a special _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Audi_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; edition, titled Rennspiel-Action. In the BGG photo gallery, Carabande has yellow/orange rails.Expanded by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Carabande Action Set_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; PitchCar is produced by Ferti. It currently has nine expansions that add _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;tight_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; curves, crossroads, small jumps, long straightaways, 45-degree curves, curved bottlenecks, loops _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; an adapter that will allow for mixing PitchCar and PitchCar Mini. PitchCar apparently also has two editions, where the first edition has the black laminate on the top and bottom of the track pieces, where the second edition only has the laminate on the top of the track pieces. In the BGG photo gallery, PitchCar has red rails.Expanded by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; PitchCar Extension_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; PitchCar Extension 2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; PitchCar Extension 3: Special Long Straights_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; PitchCar Extension 4: Stunt Race_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; PitchCar Extension 5: The Cross_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; PitchCar Extension 6: No Limit_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; PitchCar Extension 7: The Loop_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; PitchCar Extension: The Upsilon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; PitchCar Extension: The Adapter_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; PitchCar Mini_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Very rare pitchcar expension ! Limited printrun: 200 pcs The box contain 2 straight tracks with a straight edge at one end, usable as either a crossing or - if raised in one end - as a ramp for jumping. It also contains 2 straight chikanes, each with two curved rails. Plus 4 curved chikanes, each with a single rail which either form a narrow entry or exit point. Only playable with pitchcar. Not compatalbe with the original Carabande. Have more for the same price. p/h will be cheaper then.
